subject: Re: Culture Page Update
preview: Hi Keenan,   Yes sure, I missed that one page, the others were already redirected earlier. This is now done.   Have a great weekend!

full_threads.body:
Hi Keenan,

Yes sure, I missed that one page, the others were already redirected earlier. This is now done.

Have a great weekend!

Hey Heath,

Are you able to create redirects to the new Culture and Values page from the old 'People', 'Culture' and 'Careers' pages (here's an example https://acoufelt.com.au/our-culture/)


Warm regards,

Keenan DruceCreative Lead

T: +61 1800 626 462
[url=]Level 43, 264 George Street, Sydney, NSW, 2000

acoufelt.com
Ah ok, great, thanks Keenan, that's now updated too.

Hey Heath,

No dramas, that image to replace the attached screenshot. But above the 'values' section


Warm regards,

Keenan DruceCreative Lead

T: +61 1800 626 462
[url=]Level 43, 264 George Street, Sydney, NSW, 2000

acoufelt.com

Hi Keenan,

Apologies for the delay this is now live and we have also put some redirects in place from the old pages to this new one.

One question, the attached image "People_Hero", where does this need to go please?

Morning Heath,

Just following up the below, I know your super busy.

If you could give me a rough ETA that would be great


Warm regards,

Keenan DruceCreative Lead

T: +61 1800 626 462
[url=]Level 43, 264 George Street, Sydney, NSW, 2000

acoufelt.com

Hey Heath, Hope you had a great weekend. We are happy to go live with this page now
  • Can we just amend the form on the (Tell us about yourself) be sent to this email address careers.au@acoufelt.com - rather than the current one?
  • Remove the 'architectural spec manager' job opening for Melbourne (should this be easy for me to update or remove?)
  • Remove the people page from the site
  • Remove the careers page from the site
  • Replace the 'culture' link in the footer to be the 'careers' and have that link to the section on the new page
  • Update the nav link to be Culture and Values
And that's it. Thanks for everything on this page, looks great! Warm regards, Keenan DruceCreative Lead T: +61 1800 626 462 [url=]Level 43, 264 George Street, Sydney, NSW, 2000 acoufelt.com

Can't seem to figure out how to change this image? Are you able too?

Can we also make sure both those 'culture' and 'values' images are full width, for some reason they cut off (as you can see from the above, the charcoal around it)


Warm regards,

Keenan DruceCreative Lead

T: +61 1800 626 462
[url=]Level 43, 264 George Street, Sydney, NSW, 2000

acoufelt.com

Legend.

I'll get you push this live early next week

Thanks for all the work on this

Have a great weekend


Warm regards,

Keenan DruceCreative Lead

[url=]Level 43, 264 George Street, Sydney, NSW, 2000

Am I able to take over the page to make these updates?

Oh and I forgot to mention.

Warm regards,

Keenan DruceCreative Lead

Hi Keenan,

Yes sure, confirming we have made these updates too.

And that's it. Warm regards, Keenan DruceCreative Lead T: +61 1800 626 462 [url=]Level 43, 264 George Street, Sydney, NSW, 2000 acoufelt.com

Yes I'm sure you can add, but more than happy to do it for you as well.
